title: Everything about Cookbooks with Everything Cookbooks
description:

itunes:title: Everything about Cookbooks with Everything Cookbooks
itunes:author: Kristen Miglore, Molly Stevens, Kate Leahy, Kristin Donnelly, Andrea Nguyen
itunes:summary: Every episode of The Genius Recipe Tapes features an expert guest, but for the first time ever we're featuring four of them in one interview! Join us as we welcome all four hosts of Everything Cookbooks to discuss the ins and outs of what makes a great cookbook.
itunes:subtitle: Every episode of The Genius Recipe Tapes features an expert guest, but for the first time ever we're featuring four of them in one interview! Join us as we welcome all four hosts of Everything Cookbooks to discuss the ins and outs of what makes a great cookbook.
